snippet: The unidentified substance was found in an envelope in the consulate in the southern city of Guangzhou, prompting the closing of some operations.
lead_paragraph: The unidentified substance was found in an envelope in the consulate in the southern city of Guangzhou, prompting the closing of some operations.

headline.seo: Suspicious Substance Disrupts U.S. Consulate in China
headline.main: Suspicious Substance Disrupts U.S. Consulate in China
